name: Rachel Hunter
text: This is my favorite place to eat in Enterprise.  The food is amazing and the staff is exceptional.  They are so sweet and friendly.  I love how clean it is every time we go inside!  I can’t eat here enough.

name: Deaunqua Bryant
text: Oh my gosh my bowl was amazing and the staff was wonderful!

resp.text: Thank you!! You have a Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!

name: Deprecated Content
text:
Full disclaimer, I am not exactly a cultured individual. This is the only place I've ever had poké; I can't really comment on how it holds up to hawaiian food elsewhere, if it's authentic, etc. That being said, zero complaints. None. If anything they could stock a bit more black pepper sauce because that stuff is fire and they were out this last go.

Ordered from here probably a dozen times; each time was fast (customers ahead in line permitting) and the food was amazing. The storefront is a bit plain and the drinks are bottled, but who cares? If you feel like sushi with fresh ingredients you can grab in 3 minutes at 8pm before a 12 hour shift, they have you covered.

If you're afraid of trying the crazier stuff (eel with crab and seaweed salad is better than it sounds, trust me), fried karaage chicken with black pepper sauce and no vegetables is a good intro.

name: S. B.
text: 1st time here. Omg sooooo good. I ordered the fire cracker. I enjoy spicy food, this spicy is a tolerable spicy so nothing too difficult to handle. It was delicious i wish I would've ordered the large but it was my 1st time there so i just went with the regular. Def coming back.

name: Robert Stanley
text: Amazing food in a nice setting with helpful and friendly staff. I love the purple sushi rice with ahi tuna and salmon. It's great to see something like this in Enterprise!! Expect to drop about $20 for two regular bowls. Larger bowls start at $11.95. You get two proteins, your base (rice, etc), as many fruit and veggies as you like (some, like avocado or sea weed salad, are upcharges), sauce, and toppings (upcharges for some here too). They lose half a star for price, but I'm going to round up. We've been several times and have always loved what we ordered. You'll likely encounter dinner ingredient you don't know, but the staff will patiently tell you what everything is and give good suggestions as well. There are cooked protein options if you'd prefer. Highly recommend!!

name: Chera Tarbox
text: Food was excellent! The teriyaki sauce is the best I have had! We ordered thru Door Dash and food came quickly and hot. If they sold the teriyaki sauce by the bottle, I would be in heaven! I had the tappinyaki chicken bowl with teriyaki sauce!

name: PJ Lin
text: Love Ahi Poke Bar! So happy to have a poke place in Enterprise. I've had the Firecracker and also build my own bowl. After a big run - i've added extra scoop of protein $3 - totally worth it! For the quality, price is reasonable.

name: Jennah Millsap
text:
BLUF: Save your money.

This place used to be awesome. Ever since COVID and having to order online, I'm unimpressed. The second to last time we ordered, they lost our order and we're rude to my wife when she asked for an update. This time, they served us mushy brown avocados that we paid extra for. Will not return.

name: William Grimsley
text: Ahi poke bar is delicious. I chose to build my own bowl. Really good food. If you like sushi. Hawaian style. Will be going back. Give it a try.

name: Jarel Davis
text: Absolutely love it. It was my first time trying it. I found this little treasure on doordash and decided to come in person . Because sometimes doordash doesn't do these places justice. 😋 I love how everything looks and smells so fresh. I would recommend to many people who are looking for something different.

name: Yesi D
text: Hawaii style bowl

name: Robert Smith
text: Great, friendly faces and good food in a clean atmosphere. I try to go there at least twice a week now.

name: Lone Wolf Ferras
text:
Awesome place to eat. From San Antonio Texas visiting family, we weren’t sure about what to eat that would be different and this place seriously hit the spot. I highly recommend this place if you are in a mood for something tasting and healthy.

Kudos to owner!

name: Jarrod Schaub
text: After a mishap with an order through a third party, the manager went above and beyond to rectify the issue, foods pretty good too.

resp.text: Thank you for leave your review again and stopped by!!

name: Mark Perez
text: This place has been our go to place for something light and at a great price.

name: Patricia Simmons
text: I absolutely love this place. Everything I've tried is truly delicious. The owner and her staff are so very sweet. I can't say enough positive things about this restaurant! ❤❤

name: Megan Colquitt
text: The food was absolutely incredible!! Seriously you can never find this kind of food in Alabama so I was so happy to stumble across this. So fresh and yummy

name: Donna Mott
text:
We went Saturday 11/09/19 for the first time and it definitely will not be the last.  The food and the staff were awesome!  The Hawaii Style bowl was fantastic.  Everything was so fresh and tasty.  The flavors were incredible!
We need one in Dothan now!  It will be a weekly treat for us now, for sure.  If you haven't already been, do yourself a favor and go!  You will not be sorry.

name: Samuel Sanders II
text: Was my first time trying this restaurant after a little research on this cultural style of eating. Staff was nice and informative,  and food selection was abundant and very colorful. The artistic style of preparation of different dishes was amazing and the taste was even better. Will definitely be a repeat customer.

name: Mary Bouchard
text: Stopped in when we were passing through, and man, this lunch hit the spot. Quick service and the ingredients were super fresh. Lots of options.

name: Vigilante 87
text: First time having a sushi bowl type meal, it was excellent! I ordered a large "fire cracker" which is a spicy tuna bowl for $14. Worth the money and very filling.

name: foreveronempty
text: So delicious! Everything was so fresh and tasty.

name: Elizabeth Armstrong
text: This place is soooooo delicious. We were stationed in Hawaii and the poke here is even better then there. It may seem pricey but the quality of fish and ingredients is worth every dime. The tuna just melts in your mouth, so tender. The flavors from the specialty bowls are crafted perfectly. I’ve tried the classic, Hawaiian style, fire cracker, heat wave and the teppanyaki bowl. My go to is the Hawaiian because of the sweet, yet savory taste just makes me wanting more. The quality of the food, incredible flavor combinations, the perfect portions, great atmosphere and wonderful customer service makes this place a must visit if you’re ever in the area.  I absolutely love this place and recommend eating here 100 percent.

name: Ken Kirkland
text: Ordered via Door dash, order was incorrect,  I double checked,  order was exact opposite as it should have been.

name: Hannah Frye
text: Usually ALWAYS good but today the shrimp was very very soft and slightly slimy 🥴

name: Alivia M.
text: Great customer service and very nice people! It is a very clean restaurant, with a lot of healthy options!

name: Margo Battenberg
text: Very fresh and flavorful!  Will return

name: Mark Coggins
text: Remarkably good food. Staff was exceptionally helpful, friendly, and fast. 10/10! I'll most definitely be back when I'm in Enterprise again.

name: Chong Ji
text: My favorite spot to eat in Enterprise.  The staff and food are amazing!  The food is always fresh and the bowls are a great healthy food opinion

name: Sick Naban
text: Amazing food and great service! I Highly recommend!

name: James Face
text:
Boom.

Firecracker bowl.

name: Just Jess
text: Great food. I had the Hawaii style bowl with smoked salmon and shrimp. It was amazing! I also had a little of my kid's teriyaki chicken, and it was slappin too!

name: Danny Barreto
text: I love places that habe fresh food.  Everything was amazing at this place. Not many places in Enterprise that offer unique food choices.

name: Jamil Wilson
text: Outstanding

name: Jessica W
text: Great food! Definitely my favorite place to eat in this town.

name: Sick Naban
text: Delicious food, great staff, good variety

name: Noel Walton
text: Fresh, healthy food with plenty of options. Atmosphere is inviting and clean, staff is friendly and clean.

name: Jessica Hughes
text: Amazing customer service and the food is always great. It’s actually our favorite place to eat in Enterprise.

name: Matt Campbell
text: Sand in my rice. Immediately lost appetite

name: Romell “st00pid” Howell
text: This place is amazing! I'm going to give up Tokyo sushi for this place

name: Johnny and Lesa Johnson
text: FOOD IS DELICIOUS

name: Jonathan Colquitt
text: Amazing food!!! Loved this place

name: Jonnie Reeves
text: Purple rice is the best

name: Sarah Floyd
text: Pretty good poke bowls.

name: Daniel Fousse
text: I normally don’t leave reviews; this place deserves one. I’ve eaten here 5 times and it’s always a great experience and delicious food.

name: Nicco LoPorto
text: I am very impressed.

name: Crystal Wills
text: Great Poke bowls with an awesome staff!

name: Alexandria Nixon
text: Delicious, fresh, healthy food

name: Billy
text: Always fabulous!

name: Devon Brittin
text: one word-fire

name: wen
text: This is my second tried! I might not come back again. You want to know why?  TIY.

name: E K
text: First time here. Great experience. Polite young man took my order, made poke bowl accurately, quickly and efficiently. It was delicious! Definitely I will be back again.

name: Benjamin Yim
text: One of my favorite places to grab some poke! Wish the portion was a little bigger though. For the price, we should get more protein and less rice. Overall, very good though.

name: Stephen van Arcken
text: Really good poke. Nothing fancy or over the top, decent portion size, and priced similarly to other poke spots I've been to. I got the large, Greens Bowl, with Salmon and Spicy Tuna, on greens and brown rice.

name: Bailey Turnbow
text: Fast service with very fresh ingredients. Highly recommend.

name: Opal Hall
text: Delicious and fresh food. Something different to try in Birmingham. Friendly and fast service. Spacious and cool inside. Taking proper precautions with COVID. Everything was tasty and good quality. Clean environment. Good location.

name: Megan Reid
text: Ono Poke is my go to when I am attempting to eat a little bit more on the healthier side, but still be full and satisfied. I highly recommend everyone try a poke bowl even if they are nervous about expanding their taste buds, it never disappoints!

name: Ayman Salam
text: Great food and service. Quality's extremely high and you get a lot for the price. I can't help but get it every few weeks at least. The Pizitz location is also similarly great, provided many quick lunches when I had a packed work schedule.

name: JaMel Dennis
text: Ono Poke is one of my favorite spots. The ingredients are fresh, customer service is excellent & I’ve been able to try some wonderful food combinations I wouldn’t have been able to experience anywhere else. Loveeeeee this place

name: Taylor Vassey
text: LOVE ono poke! Tasty, and the ingredients are always fresh. Highly recommend if you're looking for poke in the area!

name: Jared Acosta
text: This place was great! They are only doing poke bowls right now, but we ordered three bowls to go and it was ready in like 5 minutes. Super fresh and delicious!

name: Cody Ramirez
text: Green Bowl w/Spicy Tuna & Crunch Bowl w/Spicy Tuna. Both excellent choices, clean & refreshing, decent portions & flavor punched with a bending spicy note! A quick favorite, close in our 'hood of Homewood, friendly staff, a quick lunch option with all healthy & no guilt opportunities on the menu! Will def be keeping an eye on this treasure.

name: Nina Garcia
text: Very delicious! I would recommend this to anyone looking for fresh, and healthy options! Great pricing, and friendly staff.

name: Norm Mee
text: Great option from the ordinary. Tuna is tasty but chopped very fine, almost ground up. Used to rough cut poke, more chunky. Great toppings included in price of bowl.

name: Asher
text: The food is incredible. They are always nice, fast and consistent.

name: Eric Larson
text: If you like poke, this could be your go-to in Homewood.  Spicy Tuna... Do it.

name: Lydia Pope
text: The food is great but service is awful....they are rude and when they say they are going to close at 8:00 they close at 7:30. It is very annoying when we drive over and get there at 7:30 and they are already closed.

resp.text:
Lydia , I’m so sorry for the confusion . Due to covid our hours of operation are Monday - Saturday 11-8 pm
Sunday 12-7:30 pm .
Today is Sunday and we do closed at 7:30 .

name: Amy Pfaffman
text: My bowl was filling, yummy, and healthy, and the fries are some of the best I've ever had. I can't wait to go back.

name: Jeff Holmes (Sarlacc)
text: Tasty and super fast. I ordered a custom bowl and before I could finish making my drink it was ready.

name: Oakley N
text: Who doesn’t love a good poke bowl? So many options!

name: Connor Copeland
text: This is my girlfriend and I's favorite place to eat. 10/10 would recommend

name: Aissatou Diallo
text: I love the kids bowl! It’s for a good price and it delicious!🥰 you have to try it

name: Rosa Hill
text: I love the kids meal brown rice bowl. If you don't want anything to heavy.

name: Kyle Jackson
text: Delicious Hawaiian Poke'.  Still the best I've ever had.  Thanks for the excellent and friendly service always as well.

name: ben guthrie
text: This place is fantastic. If you like sushi, you'll love this. I get spicy tuna on mixed greens with pineapple, sweet onions, crunch, scallions, fresh jalapenos, and samurai aoli. It's very good.

name: Miranda Riggs
text: Very empty and calm. Hope their business is okay, but it was nice in this pandemic. Very courteous staff! Great food.

name: Michael bice
text: Such good quality tuna. Best poke I've had and hot cheetos!

name: Karen Elise
text: I found out about Ono Poké from the Pizitz and decided to try out the bigger location. I was not disappointed! The place was clean, the food was brought out super fast! I loved the decor as well. Best Poké in Birmingham by far!

name: Amber Laughlin
text: My new favorite place

name: Michael McGrath
text: Love this place. Enjoy their bowls and the food always tastes great.

name: Gerald Eady
text: Hidden Gem!! This place ROCKS!! Try the Salmon Poke crunch bowl!! You won't be disappointed!!

name: Gendo Ikari
text: A little cramped but a good experience.

name: Joshua Burnett
text: Love their setup and food is incredible!

name: Elizabeth Shahid
text:
Second time they messed up my to-go order. I learned from the first time to check everything before I leave. Warning to all!
Delicious food but lazy workers. The receipt they printed to compare the order was correct. Their preparation of my food was wrong.

name: Mark Ware
text: The best food in edgewood! If you like fresh sushi you'll love poke!

name: Steven Elseroad
text: Incorrect hours listed and was rudely denied requested food due to incorrect hours of operation.

resp.text: Steven ,Due to Covid 19 , our store hours have change Monday-Saturday 11am - 8 pm and Sunday 11am-7:30 pm . We have been closing early for extra time for cleaning and sanitizing everything down . Sorry for this inconvenience.

name: Elizabeth Brinkley
text: Ono Pokè is the best pokè bowl I’ve ever had, especially the best in Bham. I highly recommend the Crunch bowl! The service is quick & the people are chill & the quality is excellent every time!

name: Mary Minderhout
text:
The teenagers who work here are rude. We gave it three tries and it’s the same empty restaurant and the staff sitting at the tables when we walk in the door. They don’t great you or even smile. In fact they act as if we are a bother by coming in.

The food is good but it is overpriced. They have two bowl sizes large or small. We fed two people for $20.

The second location is in the Pizitz plaza in Birmingham. That one is completely different and I recommend the second location for a good meal and friendly staff.

name: Tim Winans
text: Solid poke bowl. Whether you are at Homewood location or Pizitz it’s a yes for me. Ate here a bunch during my stay in Birmingham. Great lunch spot.

name: Marleigh Smith
text: Too expensive. It's good, I guess. They blended the spicy salmon fish to make a fish ball. Kinda weird in my opinion.

name: Senior Living Guide
text: Suprisingly great food. If you dont know. This is sushi in a bowl. Not rolled sushi but all the ingredients. It was fresh and to the table quick.  One suggestion, the normal size bowl is plenty for a normal size guy. It's a good amount of food. Good chow.

name: Whitney Macon
text: Tasty and fresh! I’ve had a lot of poke, and this was fantastic. The staff was friendly, and our orders were made quickly and accurately. We will be back!

name: Joe Riner
text: The food is fresh and very filling.

name: Caleb Wilson
text: Really fresh ingredients and very unique place. The decor is also very good and fun

name: Jake Travis
text: Great poke. Tastes just like what we had in Hawaii.

name: O P
text: Really enjoy eating here, very fresh fish, employees are very friendly, clean restaurant. Food tastes great and good value. Expect to spend around $15 for a large bowl and drink.

name: Timothy McDonald
text: Got a regular sized bowl, nice and big enough for ke to call a meal. Excellent service, will be back many more times

name: Angelia Schaeffer
text: Best spicy tuna crunch bowl ever! Great atmosphere. Really good music.

name: Witt Carpenter
text: They said my food will be ready in 2 minutes and it was

name: Jim Hooker
text: Always a winner!

name: Bonnie Hubbard
text: The food is always good and fresh. Wait staff is very nice. The restaurant is always clean as well.

name: Hangry Henny
text: Best Poké in Birmingham. You have to try it if you are visiting. It will make you come back for more.

name: Hank Powers
text: Really, really good! The staff are super helpful and make ordering easy.

name: Julius Clark
text: Great experience,  great tasting water, amazing rice, nice service

name: Jason Copeland
text: Good value and good food in this neighborhood poke place.

name: Ann Chan
text: Everything was very fresh but a bit on the sweet side but that's just personal taste.

name: gary dollar
text: the service was fast and friendly and the food was sooo good! you get a lot for your money.

name: Worth Hanson
text: Tasty bowls and a good value

name: Shane Roberts
text: So good! Wish I could eat it everyday

name: E. M. Williams
text: It was  great. Love this placr. The owner is always there making food. Very hands on..

name: Kane Bourgeois
text: I've never had a Poké Bowl before coming to this place. I am in love! I visit this place every single week!

name: Michael Moorman
text: Great food, service, and atmosphere 10/10

name: Sara Asmann
text: Love the build a bowl concept for sushi. Never disappointed

name: Delia Bun
text: Great service! The wait is rarely long and they always use fresh ingredients!

name: James Hooker
text: Fresh and delicious and spicy - if that's the way you like it - and I do!

name: Madeline Perkins
text: Delicious food, helpful staff, great options! Fun environment and fast service, too!

name: David Upton
text: It was great!

name: MrsOlatubi
text: Great service and fresh fish

name: Lindsey Cartes
text: Amazing flavors and portions!

name: JoAnn Preston
text: Fantastic food. Fantastic service

name: Laci Hanner
text: Fast service

name: Eric Askelson
text: Great poke and fries

name: Hugh Leader
text: Flavorful and fresh!

name: Richard Diamond
text: Delicious as always!

name: Michael Henderson
text: Awesome poke bowls!

name: Celsa Allende Stallworth
text: Love Love Love them.

name: Glen White
text: Small and intimate

name: Paul Dichiara
text: Good food

name: Joshua Burnett
text: Perfection

name: DJ Jeff B
text: Always 🔥

name: Krums Korner
text: Hands down the very best teriyaki chicken bowl with fried rice (or brown rice) I’ve ever had. Exceptional service with a smile. Great value, big plates of food. I can’t say enough about this place, you have to try it. The salad dressing is to die for. Greens are amazingly fresh. This place rocks!!

name: Jade Kleeschulte
text: Been here a few times and the bowls are good but they are always out of bobas so I never have even tried theirs.  Definitely need to manage their food deliveries if they are always out or quit advertising you sell them. Big disappointment when you order them and then there not there when you get there to pick up.

name: James Austin
text: Chen is amazing!  His food is always fresh and takes such pride in all the food he makes!  Family man, with a 6 month old!  Seems to really care about his customers, especially his regulars!  Will come back again and again!  Will tell everyone, there is no place better to eat in the Eastern Shore!

name: LaTisha Byrd
text: The food was so good. Thank you to the guy who took my order that also took the time to socialize with me and tell me about other types of food to try. Thanks for talking me into the Kroean bowl I ate it all by myself and was purely glutoness miserable afterwards, but it was worth it!!! I will be back.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, it was very nice meeting you. sorry about the gluten, i didnt know.

name: Jasmine
text:
Great food. HORRIBLE staff. I stopped coming for a while because of it, started back and still experience the same rude attitude or lack just general common courtesy from the employee who’s generally at the register. Again great food but service and attitude, is below bare minimum and I won’t patronize with a business that continues to show that they don’t value everyone.

UPDATE: staff calls (2x) after seeing review (not to apologize) to tell me in so few words tells that he in fact does treat me the way he does because “my mother and I always have orders that are too complicated for him and should do it the way he says”. MY MOTHER is deceased and has never eaten here & not even buried here and I just moved here a few months ago. So he admittedly treated me unkindly (when I’m nothing but polite because that’s how I want to be treated) because i obviously share the same skin tone/resemblance as another customer.

name: Alfreda Jeffords
text: Awesome little place to grab a quick bite. They also have boba tea thats fantastic.

resp.text: Yes we have great boba tea , lots of different flavors and thank you very much Alfreda for the review.

name: Charity Parazine-Moncada
text: Amazing food! Fresh, beautiful and absolutely delicious! We had the Korean Beef bowl and terriaki shrimp bowl (both with fried rice), krab wontons and the milk tea, all of which were amazing! I just wish this restaurant was in Pensacola, so that, we could eat there often! Don't let the shopping center vibe scare your away because you will be missing hard-to-find, amazing, fresh, beautiful food!!!

name: Austin Sena
text: Fast, delicious, with lots of options! Boba tea is excellent as well with variable sugar amount options

resp.text: Thanks for your 5star. greatly appreciated looking foward to seeing you again!

name: Brad Wilson
text: I stopped by there for the first time today and got a chicken teriyaki bowl.. Super fresh made to order, i ate every bite of it. I will be going back for sure. 👍

name: KALIE SWISHER
text: Had a friend recommended this place and wow I am sure glad we stopped in ! Definitely on the “list” now . The food was extremely fresh. I would HIGHLY recommend to anyone in the area. From the Poke bowls to the kitchen menu items everything was absolutely delicious.

resp.text: Sorry for the late reply. Thank you sooooo much for supporting us!

name: Blake Bishop
text: Loved it so much. New favorite place. Will be there a few times a week from now on

name: Tara
text: I LOVE this place. The build your own bowl has so many options and their poke sauce is amazing. Serving sizes are generous and the staff is so nice. Food is always so fresh and delicious!  I like that you can order ahead on their website when in a rush too. I still need to try their Boba teas but so excited they have them here now!

resp.text: Thanks Tara, your reviews is greatly appreciate and yes please try our boba tea its for sure authentic!

name: Jill Arnold
text: The food was amazing.  However, this was my first time there and had questions about different things.  The girl up front was nice but  didn't quite answer my questions.  The man who I assume is the manager or owner didn't speak or acknowledge that i was there and I was the only customer.  I tried the Boba tea.  It was good but would have been nice to have been spoken to.

resp.text: Im so sorry about that, i will make sure u feel welcome next time you visit and thank you for the review.

name: Angela Rivera Salicrup
text: After an 8 hour drive with issues this place was perfection!! The food was fresh and delicious. The staff was very helpful, patient and we're very protective of keeping everything sanitary. The Thai tea was on point. Love it! Great first meal in Alabama.

resp.text: Thanks Angela for leaving us a 5star! Glad we made you happy and rollllll tide!

name: Lovely Pink
text: The boba and the bowl were really good!!! Definitely a must try

name: sheshe berdos
text: Delicious poke bowls... especially The Salmon Lovers poke bowl.  They make the Boba teas RIGHT!!!!  And the egg rolls are the best.... very similar to Filipino egg rolls (Lumpia).  2 thumbs up!  Definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review!  You gotta do it the right way!

name: Andrea Dickey
text: The most authentic "bubble" or "boba" milk tea you can get. Egg rolls are amazing. Pricing is very fair. Excellent and friendly staff. I highly recommend eating here.

resp.text: I would give you a 10 Star for your review!! Thank you so much Andrea. We now have jasmine green tea also made in taiwan, come check it out sometime.

name: Lindsea Bishop
text: Gained 5lbs and lost all my money. AND I'D DO IT AGAIN 😤😩❤

name: Marella Porter
text: Tried this place for the first time today! I got the Salmon Lover poke bowl. It was incredible! So much flavor and “topping” variety! It all went so well together and the entire bowl was so flavorful! I underestimated the size of the bowl too! It will definitely keep you full! However, I was not so impressed with the Milk Tea/Boba. I got Thai tea and boba, both had somewhat of a “sour” taste. Overall I would visit again! Food was excellent.

resp.text: Sorry for the late reply, and sorry you didnt like the milk tea. thank you for the review very very much!

name: Forrest Koppersmith
text: Love this place! Great bowls and hibachi. Quick service awesome staff!
Food is pretty good, but I called in a to go order wasn't even prepared until I arrived.

resp.text: Im sorry you had to wait for your food. Our establishment is base on a fresh food or cook after you order system. We serve the same quality food you get at a dine in restaurant.(we dont pre-make anything) So for the same quality food at a more budget price we have to cut labor and add to the food cost. So with less labor sometimes its overwhelming when mutiple orders come in. Hope you understand, and again we dont want anyone to wait.

name: brian denton
text: Always great. So fresh.

name: Crystal Clemmons
text: Supper yummy! We'll definitely be back!

name: Tesia Jines
text: This place have really good bubble tea and lots of flavor 😋

name: Maysun Marino
text: Great place to eat for authentic poke bowls! Immaculate staff and customer service. 10/10 would eat there again

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great support.

name: Doug McNutt
text: Very fantastic. Extremely fresh tuna and salmon that is not stringy at all (the cardinal sin for Poke joints!). After that everything flows very smoothly. Create your own bowl and they do have the carb-free salad option as a base which is very nice.

resp.text: Thank you, we are looking forward your next visit!

name: Frank Fletcher
text: DELICIOUS! I did a make your own poke bowl and it was absolutely loaded with fresh tuna  and salmons. All the other ingredients were fresh and plentiful including avocado, pineapple, cilantro, edamame, crab meat salad, seaweed salad, etc! I didn't try the teriyaki yet but a couple of coworkers did and it looked delicious as well.

resp.text: Thank you! Try the Teriyaki, you will love it ,too

name: Brendan Abel
text: Great love this place, Try the bubble tea. Chen will set you up right

resp.text: Thank you for the support Brendan!

name: Carey Hilliard
text: We ordered the teriyaki chicken, steak, fried rice, vegetables, and ginger salad. Everything was perfectly cooked and delicious.

resp.text: Thank you very much Carey. I notice you came back the following day, that means greatly to us!

name: William Dixon
text: Fresh food! Excellent flavors and extremely fair pricing. I will eat here every chance I get. Finally we have something other then fried food in Spanish Fort.

resp.text: Thank you, Will! Serving the healthy food is our goal, we are so glad you enjoyed the food here.

name: Sockmnky
text: The food is fine, little expensive for what you get, but it was worth trying.

name: Catherine Miller
text: Prompt and friendly service.  I had the Ohana  Poke bowl over sushi rice (without jalapeños) and it was delicious!  Fresh, with the perfect amount of spicy, savory, and sweet.  Very filling too, will be back!

resp.text: We are looking forward to serve you again!

name: Elizabeth Alfieri
text: We loved this place so much the food was great, service was great!

resp.text: Thank you very much Elizabeth sorry took me so long to reply your review.

name: Amber McLeod
text: Food was fresh and abundantly flavorful!

resp.text: Thanks you for the review, and sorry about the late reply.

name: Michael Edwards
text: Fantastic place in Spanish Fort. Has my favorite characteristics such as clean, friendly and quality food. Will be coming back frequently.

resp.text: So glad you tried us out today, we are looking forward to seeing you again

name: Jared Wallace
text: Very good, fast and friendly service.  So glad to have this close to home!

resp.text: We are so glad to serve you here

name: Ashlee Phillips
text: Friendly and helpful staff, and of course delicious food options!

resp.text: Thank you so much Ashlee, hopefully see you soon.

name: Angie W.
text: Tried the ohaba poke bowl. The food is delicious and the service is absolutely fantastic! Must try!!!

name: Malia A
text: Ai maikaʻi no kou kino/ Food that is great for you! Mahalo!/Thank you!

name: Jackson Du
text: Highly recommended! Amazing Poke Bowls and even better sushi! The Fish Lover's bowl is heavenly. The Summer Days roll is great either with cooked or raw salmon. Clean and spacious dinning environment with a nice atmosphere. Good place for a quick pickup or dine in with a few friends.

name: Allison Offerle
text:
Every time I come (and its almost every day) the staff is friendly and the food is delicious!   You like sushi? Then you'll love poke, it's a deconstructed sushi roll and you get more bang for the buck and personalization!

The avocado fries (Cajun seasoning is a must!) are a reason alone to keep coming back.
Dole flavor rotate every week and a perfect treat in the heat of Mobile summers.

Highly Recommend Ohana Poke to all my coworkers and friends and visitors!!

name: krista lam
text: Came here once, loved it, and have been coming back a few days now. They recently added sushi to their menu and those are definitely their best items. You can't go wrong with any rolls on their menu. The rice was cooked perfectly and the portions of protein are generous. Poke bowls are great too, and huge. A lot of drinks option available for anyone who loves exotic fruity beverages.

name: Mason
text: Excellent service, helpful staff. Food was absolutely delicious. We had a bowl with salmon and tuna, avocado fries, and the egg rolls. What you see is what you get here and it's all great. Do yourself a favor and stop by.

resp.text: Thank you Mason for this great review! Hope to see you back soon!

name: Mireli Scott
text: Our first time, definitely not the last.  It was so good and refreshing. Food was hot, fresh, and to die for. I highly recommend the avocado fries. The atmosphere is quiet, clean soothing, and very modern yet chîc. Cant wait to go back!

resp.text: Thank you! We are so glad to hear you enjoyed everything!

name: Carson Quina
text: Seriously delicious food. We didn't know what to get so we took recommendations from the staff and just tried a little bit of everything. Everything we tried was so good. We will definitely be going back.

resp.text: Thank you for this awesome review! Hope to see you back soon!

name: Huy Tran
text: Premium Poke Bowls. Probably one of the best Poke Bowls I have ever had and I have eaten at a lot of them. Everything is made to order, so if you order hot items like the beef or spam, it will take a bit longer but it is worth.

name: Theresa Mitchell
text: So fresh tasting. Where not skimpy on ingredients. Establishment clean organized. Have been there several times.

name: Tiffani Weber
text: Ohana is my favorite Poke spot in Mobile. They use great island flavors and give items their own twist. I love the staff, the food and dole whip! really let’s just say i love everything about Ohana. They truly are like family. If you haven’t tried them you are definitely missing out. Go hungry because you’ll want to try at least 2-3 items! ♥️

name: Samantha Smyth-Chandler
text: The food was great! Poke was a new experience for us, amd the staff was SUPER helpful about describing ingredients and answering questions. All 3 of us loved the food, staff, and overall experience. They also have Dole whip. Yum!

resp.text: Thank you! We are so glad you enjoyed your first experienced of Poké with us!

name: Savannah Nichols
text: I discovered this place 2 months ago and I’ve come here at least twice a week ever since. I deeply wish I could erase the knowledge of what the Fish Lovers bowl tastes like so I could experience it again for the first time. The first bite of the Tropical Storm bowl will mend any pain or suffering you have ever experienced. This place makes other Poke places taste like cardboard, comparatively. That’s just the food, but the cleanliness/decor/Hawaiian vibes/friendly staff are also all 5 stars. Thank you guys, you all rock.

resp.text: Thank you Savannah for this amazing review! We appreciate you so very much! And we are so glad to have you as part of our Ohana 💛

name: Logan Parnell
text: Very delicious! I've never had poke' and I was extremely impressed. Seemed clean as well.

name: Sheik Win
text: So, I absolutely love this place! The food quality is so good and fresh and the staff is usually really kind and welcoming.

name: Nghia Huynh
text: Very fast and efficient spot for a fresh and light meal. The atmosphere is relaxing and the decor is very minimal and modern (makes for some great Instagram food posts). The staff members are kind and helpful with ordering as it can be confusing for those that are unfamiliar to ordering poke. The poke is overall very good and the quality of the ingredients are very apparent from the first bite.

name: Benjamin Pollock
text: What a great spot to dine! The food was fantastic and very fresh. I eat sushi all the time and noticed the exceptional quality found here. The menu features a “build your own” Poke bowl which I thought was really clever and cool. You can choose between many different proteins such as shrimp, chicken, steak, salmon, and more. There are so many different toppings to choose from as well, which were very delicious. I would definitely recommend this place!

resp.text: Thank you and thanks for coming by!

name: Mr. Bullard
text: Great wings, great service, clean bathrooms. Not cheap but reasonable prices

name: Craig Pomeroy
text: Great staff and amazing food. The lemongrass chicken is my fave, but everything I have had was wonderful. And their Dole Whip makes for a perfect, refreshing dessert. Highly recommended!

name: Tobbi White
text: Omg Sooooo good!  Dont be afraid to try this different food.  It is fantastic.

name: T O
text: Delicious!! The food is really fresh and never dissappoints!

resp.text: Thank you! Hope to see you back soon!

name: Elizabeth Wilson
text: Wonderful delicious food,tried for 1st time and definitely will get again

name: Rebekah Dawson
text: Every time I go to Ohana (or order delivery) I am NOT disappointed. Best poke option in Mobile no doubt! They are GENEROUS with their proteins and everything is ALWAYS fresh. Ya'll stop in and give it a try-they have something for EVERYONE (even my picky husband)

name: Allura Wheeler
text: This place was amazing the poke bowl was so fresh and the flavors were incredible!

name: Abby Arceneaux
text: Ohana Poké is always my go to poke bowl restaurant. I have been on a poke bowl kick for the past couple of months and can not get enough! Their fish and toppings are so fresh and the workers are very helpful and polite. I definitely would recommend this to anyone who loves sushi or poke bowls!

name: Linda Leng
text: The food is fresh and delicious! My favorite item "from the kitchen" is the avocado fries!! I don't normally like avocados but these fries are so good!!  If you are undecided on building your own bowl, try one of their signature bowls because you can't go wrong with any of them! The staff is very friendly and helpful! If you're in the Mobile area, definitely give them a try, you won't regret it!

name: Lindsey Riddick
text: The food here is amazing! The bowls are delicious and made to order. I also got the avocado fries, which were so yummy with the sauce. I will definitely be going back soon!

name: Kelsie Caudle
text: first visit & I was highly impressed! kid friendly & very welcoming employees and owners! I ordered the BBQ wings, Avocado Fries and Egg rolls! I enjoyed every piece! cooked to order, fresh and delicious! definitely a spot you all should check out! support local business owners!

name: Sydney Davis
text: The food is great, the staff is friendly, and the restaurant itself is so cute!! I love that Ohana doesn’t charge extra for certain toppings like other poké places. And the portions are big!

name: William McDaniel
text:
This is a fantastic Restaurant!
The staff is young, energetic, very polite and helpful!
The atmosphere is very clean and crisp.
A very family oriented place.
The best part for last.
The food is DELICIOUS !
This is excellent five star quality food-
and very, very fresh!
I will be back. I will be telling my friends!

name: Courtney Ogburn
text: Their poke bowls avocado fries are absolutely amazing! I ordered a bowl with Ahi Tuna and Salmon and the quality of the ingredients were perfect. Not only is the food instagram feed worthy, but so is the interior! The interior design of Ohana Poke is stunning and makes for an extraordinary backdrop for some cute photos. If you're looking for somewhere to stop for lunch or dinner think about supporting a locally owned, small business and eat here.

name: Jeff N
text: This is probably my favorite Poke place in Mobile. The atmosphere is clean, modern, very enjoyable when you're there. I ordered the Local's Only bowl, it has a great mixture of toppings, flavor and jalapeño for some heat. I like that they innovate new dishes to test how people would enjoy them. Looking forward to trying out the wings & other bowls.

name: susan vinson
text: We love Ohana. Their poke is delicious!

name: Adrienne Tate
text: Food is always good. Customer service is always friendly and fast. Healthy options are a big plus..along with the Dole Whip 😋

name: James Nolan Jr
text: The tuna bowl was one of the best i have ever eaten. The food was so fresh ,and the flavors and seasoning were amazing. I would recommend them to everyone.

resp.text: Thank you for this awesome review! Hope to see you back soon!

name: Michelle Byrd
text: Everything is made fresh to order and is very good. Mobile needed this place! Try it. You'll love it!

name: Tina Nguyen
text: If you're in the mobile area, look no further. This Hawaiian-Asian inspired restaurant is in the heart of the city next to the Jeep dealership on Schillinger road. The food was amazing, customer service was top notch and best of all this place is a very safe, social distance-friendly spot. The decor is modern and so fitting for a family business. So, if ya wanna take a pic for the gram.. this is the place! My boyfriend and I visited while we were in town and I am so happy we did. We ordered the customizable poke bowl (all ingredients were super fresh which is very important to me when it comes to raw fish), the lava wings, avocado fries + Cajun seasoning (AVOCADO LOVERS MUST TRY). The drinks are organic and super refreshing. Have I mentioned that they have dole whip? Like.. the kind they have at Disney but without the long lines and Florida humidity. We got the pineapple and it was soooo good and refreshing! If you haven't been here, please do. You won't regret it! And if you are a good friend, tell all your friends and family! Support local businesses who value good food + patrons. Definitely deserves 5 stars!

name: Amelia Taite
text: I love this place!! I eat there at least twice a week now and the food is awesome! I haven't eaten sushi since I discovered this spot!

resp.text: Thank you kindly for this review Amelia! We hope to see you always 💛

name: Fabiola Zane
text: Fresh and delicious, and great portions! Love to build my own bowl...😊

name: Kayla Brown
text: Ohana Poké is the best poké place in Mobile, I have tried 3 others and this one is so good!!! The fish is fresh and the add ons are a good variety! The workers are so welcoming and the place is very aesthetically pleasing.

name: Lisa “Lisab” Brannon
text: Love this place!  Food is always delicious, staff very friendly and helpful, and restaurant is very clean!

name: chris Lambert
text: Love this place fresh food amazing flavor and super friendly staff

name: Austin Thornhaugh
text: Excellent quality components put together well by a caring and pleasant staff. I'm ethnic Hawaiian and this is my go to place in Mobile.

resp.text: Thank you Austin! 💛— you have won our Google Giveaway! Please stop by to redeem your prize!

name: Lyla Kisa
text: I’m not a big fan of poke bowls but the avocado fries, the spam musubi, chicken wings, and yessss the dole whips are worth the drive!!!

name: Amanda Graves Sanders
text: Excellent food. Great atmosphere. Amazing staff.

name: Steve Shackelford
text: Great place, poke bowls are great and advocdo fries!

name: John Medzerian
text: So good. Kimchi is on point

resp.text: Thank you and Thanks for stopping by!

name: Reba Gail
text: Pathetic.  So disappointing.

resp.text: Hi Reba. We are so very  sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your experience with us. If you decide to dine with us again, please let us know how we can make your experience better. Thank you!

name: Aaron Allred
text: Amazing meal!
